title: The Anadromist Update August 2020 (Georgian, Personal and Channel Updates)
description:
So what am I up to these days? What's going on here in Tbilisi? What's coming down the road on this channel? Have you checked out my other channels yet? This an update for mid-August 2020. Many changes are afoot. Allow me to share them with you. 


.....
HEY! YOU CAN SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL TODAY! Please consider a monthly contribution through PayPal to receive extra content and to help me afloat here in Georgia. And if you start today you can get 10 hours worth of extra content immediately. 
Click this... https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG
Watch this video for more about receiving extra content: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nykTp3TziRY

The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 

Visit my Gravity From Above channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 

The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. 
https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 

And to understand more about my life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream
Byrne
#theanadromist #georgiancrossroads #history
